summary: Completely redesigned admin panel UI with modern, minimal, and simple design. Updated layout with gradient accents, glassmorphism effects, and smooth animations. Redesigned products tab with modern cards, improved filtering, and better visual hierarchy. Added upload/export functionality for translations with drag-and-drop support. Products now need to be seeded from data/products.ts using 'npx pnpm seed:products' command to sync with website.
current_status: Admin panel redesigned with modern UI. Products tab shows improved design but needs seeding to display products. Translations tab has upload/export with drag-and-drop. All components use modern styling with gradients, shadows, and smooth transitions. Next: Run seed command to sync products from website.
